thread.title: 2 Arab attackers shot after they stab Israeli
thread.title_full: 2 Arab attackers shot after they stab Israeli | News24

author: news24.com
title: 2 Arab attackers shot after they stab Israeli
text:
Jerusalem - Two Arab attackers stabbed an Israeli on Thursday and were then shot by police, as diplomatic efforts continued to try to bring an end to a month-long spate of violence.
Israeli police spokesperson Micky Rosenfeld said the attackers, whose identities were not immediately known, were seriously wounded. Rosenfeld said the Israeli man was lightly wounded.
Police spokesperson Luba Samri said police saw the attackers stabbing the 25-year-old man near a bus stop in the city of Beit Shemesh, west of Jerusalem, when they shot them.
The incident is the latest in a wave of near-daily attacks on Israelis by Palestinian or Arab attackers. Ten Israelis have been killed over the last month, mainly in stabbing attacks. On the Palestinian side, 47 people have been killed, 26 of them identified by Israel as attackers, the others killed in clashes with Israeli forces.
